summary: This is an email chain forwarding a court order from Judge Nathan regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's case, directing the MDC (Metropolitan Detention Center) to take certain steps by April 30, 2021. The correspondence is between legal staff, likely from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: Issued an order on the docket in Ghislaine Maxwell's case, directing the MDC to take certain steps by April 30, 2021.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the court case for which Judge Nathan issued an order.

connections.description: Judge Nathan issued a court order regarding Maxwell's case, directing the MDC to take certain steps.

events.title: Judge Nathan Issues Order in Maxwell Case
events.description: Judge Nathan issued an order on the docket in Ghislaine Maxwell's case, directing the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) to take certain steps by April 30, 2021.

keyFacts: Judge Nathan issued a court order regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's case on April 29, 2021.
The order directed the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) to take certain steps by April 30, 2021.
The correspondence involves legal staff from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
